column4: i asked a long time ago about a progrom to download music and other files for ubuntu... the answer i got was frostwire... is there anything that would be free to download and use?
anybody know of a free program that is used for downloading music?
lol... a P2P progrom is what i would need... like limewire on windows
there's umm frostwire I believe which is an opensource implementation of limewire (at least I think that's correct)
